name: ArbitrableBetList
description: ArbitrableBetList This smart contract is a viewer moderation for the bet goal contract.

eventDecorators.name: BetSubmitted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

eventDecorators.name: RequestSubmitted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

eventDecorators.name: BetStatusChange
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

eventDecorators.name: RewardWithdrawal
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

eventDecorators.name: MetaEvidence
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

eventDecorators.name: Dispute
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: who got the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: weis paid for purchase.

eventDecorators.name: Evidence
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: who got the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: weis paid for purchase.

eventDecorators.name: Ruling
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a relay server registers or updates its details. Looking up these events allows a client to discover registered Relay Servers.

functionDecorators.name: challengeRequest
functionDecorators.description: Challenges the latest request of a bet. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount. Reimburses unused ETH. TRUSTED.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet ID with the request to challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided or if not enough funds were provided to create a dispute.

functionDecorators.name: fundAppeal
functionDecorators.description: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded. TRUSTED.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _side
parameterDecorators.description: The recipient of the contribution.

functionDecorators.name: changeSharedStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by parties when there isn't a winner or loser.

parameterDecorators.name: _sharedStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: requestStatusChange
functionDecorators.description: Submits a request to change an address status. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount and reimburses the rest. TRUSTED.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The address.

functionDecorators.name: batchRoundWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws rewards and reimbursements of multiple rounds at once. This function is O(n) where n is the number of rounds. This could exceed gas limits, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions to the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The request from which to withdraw contributions.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: The round from where to start withdrawing.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Rounds greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds, iterates until the last round.

functionDecorators.name: rule
functionDecorators.description: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Overrides parent function to account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _ruling
parameterDecorators.description: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Not able/wanting to make a decision".

functionDecorators.name: changeRequesterBaseDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Change the base amount required as a deposit to make a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _requesterBaseDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: The new base amount of wei required to make a request.

functionDecorators.name: batchRequestWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws rewards and reimbursements of multiple requests at once. This function is O(n*m) where n is the number of requests and m is the number of rounds. This could exceed gas limits, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions to the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: The request from which to start withdrawing.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Requests greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of request, iterates until the last request.

parameterDecorators.name: _roundCursor
parameterDecorators.description: The round of each request from where to start withdrawing.

parameterDecorators.name: _roundCount
parameterDecorators.description: Rounds greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds a request has, iteration for that request will stop at the last round.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFeesAndRewards
functionDecorators.description: Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions to a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index submission with the request from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The request from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round from which to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: getRoundInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the information on a round of a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The queried bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The request to be queried.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round to be queried.

functionDecorators.name: executeRequest
functionDecorators.description: Executes a request if the challenge period passed and no one challenged the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index with the request to execute.

functionDecorators.name: getRequestInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets information on a request made for a bet.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The queried bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The request to be queried.

functionDecorators.name: isPermitted
functionDecorators.description: Return true if the bet is on the list.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

functionDecorators.name: getBetInfo
functionDecorators.description: Returns bet information. Includes length of requests array.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The queried bet index.

functionDecorators.name: changeLoserStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _loserStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeGoalBetRegistry
functionDecorators.description: Change the address of the goal bet registry contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _goalBetRegistry
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new goal bet registry contract.

functionDecorators.name: getContributions
functionDecorators.description: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The position of the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The position of the round.

parameterDecorators.name: _contributor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contributor.

functionDecorators.name: submitEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to an evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: changeWinnerStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the winner of the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _winnerStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeArbitrator
functionDecorators.description: Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes that may be raised in the next requests. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrator
parameterDecorators.description: The new trusted arbitrator to be used in the next requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitratorExtraData
parameterDecorators.description: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

functionDecorators.name: betCount
functionDecorators.description: Return the numbers of bets that were submitted. Includes bets that never made it to the list or were later removed.

functionDecorators.name: amountWithdrawable
functionDecorators.description: Return the sum of withdrawable wei of a request an account is entitled to. This function is O(n), where n is the number of rounds of the request. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: _betID
parameterDecorators.description: The bet index to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The contributor for which to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _request
parameterDecorators.description: The request from which to query for.

functionDecorators.name: changeTimeToChallenge
functionDecorators.description: Change the duration of the challenge period.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengePeriodDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of the challenge period.

functionDecorators.name: changeMetaEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _registrationMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The meta evidence to be used for future registration request disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _clearingMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The meta evidence to be used for future clearing request disputes.

functionDecorators.name: changeChallengerBaseDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengerBaseDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: The new base amount of wei required to challenge a request.

functionDecorators.name: changeGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Change the governor of the token curated registry.

parameterDecorators.name: _governor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new governor.
